metadata.name: DOLCEHEIGHTS: Access Pass
metadata.description:
The DolceHeights FW21 Collection is an unlockable exclusive Access-Pass minted on the Ethereum Blockchain. 

A Physical Limited edition of the DolceHeights x NewEra 59FIFTY Fitted Hat will be redeemable upon purchase. Limited by Sizes. 
The remaining claims after December 31, 2022, will be available: TBD

This Access Pass includes an experience curated by DolceHeights which will consist of Airdrops, Pre-sales, discounts on affiliated partners, exclusive roles, Web-3 integration, governance suffrage, redeemable prizes, giveaways & much more. 

This collectible will have stages of evolution and will act as a carry-over, allowing holders to have the ability to purchase limited products or to participate in exclusive events.

A new path for a new world. A NewEra has dawned upon us.
